${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:ThrowingHammer.NAME: Throwing Hammer
${modID}:ThrowingHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 2 ${modID}:Cure. NL Apply 1 ${modID}:Scorch. NL Put this card on top of your draw pile.
${modID}:ThrowingHammer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 2 ${modID}:Cure. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Apply 1 ${modID}:Scorch. NL Return this to hand.

${modID}:SmokeScreen.NAME: Smoke Screen
${modID}:SmokeScreen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and reduce the cost of the next card you play by 1.

${modID}:TacticalStrafe.NAME: Tactical Strafe
${modID}:TacticalStrafe.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card, then discard 1 card.
${modID}:TacticalStrafe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards, then discard 1 card.

${modID}:ThermiteGrenade.NAME: Thermite Grenade
${modID}:ThermiteGrenade.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! ${modID}:Scorch to ALL enemies.

${modID}:AshesToAshes.NAME: Ashes to Ashes
${modID}:AshesToAshes.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card containing "Grenade", return it to your hand.
${modID}:AshesToAshes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When you play a card containing "Grenade", return it to your hand.

${modID}:SolarRampart.NAME: Solar Rampart
${modID}:SolarRampart.DESCRIPTION: If the last card played this combat was a skill, gain !B! Block and !M! ${modID}:Cure.

${modID}:FierySplendor.NAME: Fiery Splendor
${modID}:FierySplendor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double your ${modID}:Cure. NL Double ALL ${modID}:Scorch. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BringTheHeat.NAME: Bring the Heat
${modID}:BringTheHeat.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your ${modID}:Cure to ALL enemies.
${modID}:BringTheHeat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to double your ${modID}:Cure to ALL enemies.

${modID}:BurningFists.NAME: Burning Fists
${modID}:BurningFists.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply ${modID}:Scorch equal to your ${modID}:Cure.
${modID}:BurningFists.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply ${modID}:Scorch equal to your ${modID}:Cure.

${modID}:PercussiveFlames.NAME: Percussive Flames
${modID}:PercussiveFlames.DESCRIPTION: When you apply ${modID}:Scorch, apply 1 more. NL Add !M! Burns to your hand.
${modID}:PercussiveFlames.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you apply ${modID}:Scorch, apply 1 more. NL Add !M! Burn to your hand.

${modID}:Consecrate.NAME: Consecrate
${modID}:Consecrate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. Heal HP equal to unblocked damage.

${modID}:ForgeMaster.NAME: Forge Master
${modID}:ForgeMaster.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Ignitions you cause deal 30 damage to other enemies instead of 15.

${modID}:SunfireFurnace.NAME: Sunfire Furnace
${modID}:SunfireFurnace.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Cure. You cannot lose ${modID}:Cure until your next turn.

${modID}:PhoenixRising.NAME: Phoenix Rising
${modID}:PhoenixRising.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! ${modID}:Cure. NL Permanently increase this card's ${modID}:Cure by 1. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BurningTreads.NAME: Burning Treads
${modID}:BurningTreads.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Scorch. NL Whenever you play a card this turn, the enemy gains 1 ${modID}:Scorch.

${modID}:Firewalker.NAME: Firewalker
${modID}:Firewalker.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Scorch to ALL enemies. NL Gain 1 Artifact.

${modID}:Frostburn.NAME: Frostburn
${modID}:Frostburn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Scorch. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Slow. NL Gain ${modID}:Frost_Armor.

${modID}:RememberedVow.NAME: Remembered Vow
${modID}:RememberedVow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Randomly increase one of these by !M! permanently. NL Costs 1 less if *Broken *Oath is not in your deck. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:RememberedVow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Increase both of these by !M! permanently. NL Costs 1 less if *Broken *Oath is not in your deck. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BrokenOath.NAME: Broken Oath
${modID}:BrokenOath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Costs 1 less if *Remembered *Vow is not in your deck.

${modID}:HungeringFlame.NAME: Hungering Flame
${modID}:HungeringFlame.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Equalize your ${modID}:Hunger and ${modID}:Cure. NL End your turn.

${modID}:Gnaw.NAME: Gnaw
${modID}:Gnaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each [E] you have.

${modID}:StarvingGrenade.NAME: Starving Grenade
${modID}:StarvingGrenade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Hunger 2. NL Take !M! damage for each [E] you have.

${modID}:VoidwallGrenade.NAME: Voidwall Grenade
${modID}:VoidwallGrenade.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy hits your Block, apply !M! ${modID}:Suppress to them.

${modID}:SuppressionGrenade.NAME: Suppression Grenade
${modID}:SuppressionGrenade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 ${modID}:Suppress for each [E] you have. NL Play this twice.

${modID}:PurgingMaw.NAME: Purging Maw
${modID}:PurgingMaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and yourself. NL ${modID}:Hunger !M! for each hit.

${modID}:OrbitalShield.NAME: Orbital Shield
${modID}:OrbitalShield.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! to a random enemy 3 times. NL Gain Block equal to unblocked damage.

${modID}:DreadedVisage.NAME: Dreaded Visage
${modID}:DreadedVisage.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Suppress to ALL enemies for each Void card in your draw pile. NL Exhaust ALL Voids in your draw pile.

${modID}:UnwaveringStarBase.NAME: Unwavering Star
${modID}:UnwaveringStarBase.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Does nothing until you've chosen a path.
${modID}:UnwaveringStarBase.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Does nothing until you've chosen a path. NL (Remove either *Remembered *Vow or *Broken *Oath)

${modID}:UnwaveringStarVow.NAME: Unwavering Star
${modID}:UnwaveringStarVow.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Hunger !M!. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Randomly increase one of these by 1 permanently. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:UnwaveringStarVow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Hunger !M!. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Increase both of these by 1 permanently. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Vengeance.NAME: Vengeance
${modID}:Vengeance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take health damage, apply !M! ${modID}:Suppress to that enemy. NL When it dies, ${modID}:Hunger equal to its max health.

${modID}:DesolateWill.NAME: Desolate Will
${modID}:DesolateWill.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an Unplayable card, draw 1 card.
${modID}:DesolateWill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you draw an Unplayable card, draw 1 card.

${modID}:DoomFall.NAME: Doom Fall
${modID}:DoomFall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Void card in your draw pile. NL Exhaust ALL Voids in your draw pile.

${modID}:EmptyEmbrace.NAME: Empty Embrace
${modID}:EmptyEmbrace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Void cards lose Ethereal. NL Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies when you draw a Void card.

${modID}:DarkGift.NAME: Dark Gift
${modID}:DarkGift.DESCRIPTION: Gain a random common relic. NL Lose 3 Max HP. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:DarkGift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain a random relic. NL Lose 3 Max HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SatiationBlockMod.NAME: Satiation Block
${modID}:SatiationBlockMod.DESCRIPTION: You don't lose this block at the start of your turn.

${modID}:Satiation.NAME: Satiation
${modID}:Satiation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each Void in your draw pile. NL Exhaust ALL Voids in your draw pile. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.
${modID}:Satiation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Hunger 2. NL Gain !B! Block for each Void in your draw pile. NL Exhaust ALL Voids in your draw pile. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

${modID}:Starvation.NAME: Starvation
${modID}:Starvation.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Hunger 1 at the start of your turn. Increase this amount by !M! every turn.

${modID}:ColdDarkGentle.NAME: Cold, Dark, Gentle
${modID}:ColdDarkGentle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Hunger 10. NL Reduce the cost of this card to 0 if an enemy is frozen.

${modID}:AbyssalFlare.NAME: Abyssal Flare
${modID}:AbyssalFlare.DESCRIPTION: Convert your ${modID}:Cure into Block and ${modID}:Hunger equal to the converted amount.
${modID}:AbyssalFlare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Convert your ${modID}:Cure into Block and ${modID}:Hunger equal to the converted amount. NL Ignite a random enemy.

${modID}:LeechingGrab.NAME: Leeching Grab
${modID}:LeechingGrab.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL debuffs from an enemy. NL Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block for each stack removed.

${modID}:DirePredicament.NAME: Dire Predicament
${modID}:DirePredicament.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL your debuffs. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust ALL cards in your hand and discard pile.
${modID}:DirePredicament.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL your debuffs. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust ALL cards in your discard pile.

${modID}:KnowledgeShock.NAME: Knowledge Shock
${modID}:KnowledgeShock.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an effect would have you discard a card, instead ${modID}:Hunger 1, and draw 1 card.

${modID}:PulseGrenade.NAME: Pulse Grenade
${modID}:PulseGrenade.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! ${modID}:Jolt to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Overload.NAME: Overload
${modID}:Overload.DESCRIPTION: Double an enemy's ${modID}:Jolt. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:SeismicStrike.NAME: Seismic Strike
${modID}:SeismicStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal 2*X damage. NL Apply 2*X ${modID}:Jolt. NL Gain 2*X ${modID}:Amp. NL Refund 1 [E].
${modID}:SeismicStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 2*X damage. NL Apply 2*X ${modID}:Jolt. NL Gain 2*X ${modID}:Amp. NL Draw X cards. NL Refund 1 [E].

${modID}:SturdyCircuitry.NAME: Sturdy Circuitry
${modID}:SturdyCircuitry.DESCRIPTION: Refund 1 [E] when you play a card that costs more than !M!.

${modID}:Poke.NAME: Poke
${modID}:Poke.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Discard 1 card.

${modID}:Prod.NAME: Prod
${modID}:Prod.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Jolt. NL Draw 1 card. NL Discard 1 card.

${modID}:SearingVoltage.NAME: Searing Voltage
${modID}:SearingVoltage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy gains ${modID}:Scorch, they also gain 1 ${modID}:Jolt.
${modID}:SearingVoltage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy gains ${modID}:Scorch, they also gain 1 ${modID}:Jolt. NL Whenever an enemy ${modID}:Ignites, gain 10 ${modID}:Amp.

${modID}:Battery.NAME: Battery
${modID}:Battery.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL your ${modID}:Amp and regain it at the start of your next turn.
